description: Ginger and sweet mango add tropical flavours to this quick and easy stir fry.
name: Chicken, Ginger & Mango Stir Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large mango, stoned, peeled and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: In a large wok over a medium high heat, heat half the oil and add the chicken strips. Cook for 4-5 minutes and remove from the wok with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Add the remaining oil, spring onions, garlic and ginger to the wok and cook for 30 seconds, then add the mixed vegetables and mango slices and cook for 1 minute.
Add the chicken back into the pan, pour over the soy sauce, lime juice and honey and cook for 2 minutes until fully coated with sauce.
Divide between four plates and serve immediately.
